content.en: Battery health prediction: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms, such as neural networks and machine learning models, to predict the state of health and estimate the remaining useful life of lithium-ion batteries. These algorithms, including gated recurrent unit neural networks, feed-forward neural networks, and long short-term memory networks, are being used to improve battery management systems and ensure efficient battery performance. Additionally, hybrid methods that combine different algorithms, such as CNN, LSTM, and DNN, are being developed to enhance the accuracy of state of health estimation.
content.da: Batteritilstand forudsigelse: Forskere har udforsket brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom neurale netværk og maskinlæringsmodeller, til at forudsige tilstand og estimere den resterende levetid for lithium-ion batterier. Disse algoritmer, herunder gated recurrent unit neurale netværk, feed-forward neurale netværk og long short-term memory netværk, anvendes til at forbedre batteristyringssystemer og sikre effektiv batteriydelse. Derudover udvikles hybridmetoder, der kombinerer forskellige algoritmer, såsom CNN, LSTM og DNN, til at forbedre nøjagtigheden af tilstandsvurderingen.
